name: Bake It Till You Make It!
name_original: Bake It Till You Make It!
description:
By Syd E. and Julia N.

Bake it Till You make it is a timed, item collection game that follows an ambitious ball of dough. The player begins the game as a shapeless, chocolate-y mound, and must collect as many baking ingredients as possible in order to become a completely finished cake before time runs out.

Controls:

Press Spacebar to start, and use W A S D or the Arrow Keys to move.
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
